edu.tamut.IP.ImageUtils
Class iKernel

java.lang.Object
  edu.tamut.IP.ImageUtils.iKernel

public class iKernel
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the width, height, row indexing modifier, and column indexing modifier of a Kernel for spatial filtering with a minimum kernel size of 3x3 Only odd Kernels are allowed, if an even kernel is presented then the kernel size is reduced by 1

Author:
Glen Wallace

Constructor Detail

iKernel

public iKernel(int width,
               int height)
Parameters:
width - Width of the nxm kernel. 3 is the minimum width, and if the inputed width is even then it is subtracted by 1.
height - Height of the nxm kernel 3 is the minimum height, and if the inputed height is even then it is subtracted by 1.
Method Detail

getWidth

public int getWidth()
Returns:
Width of the nxm kernel

getHeight

public int getHeight()
Returns:
Height of the nxm kernel

ColMod

public int ColMod()
Returns:
colMod: a modifier for indexing the columns of an image with a mirrored border based on this kernel

RowMod

public int RowMod()
Returns:
rowMod: a modifier for indexing the rows of an image with a mirrored border based on this kernel

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns:
size: width*height, it's the total number of pixels in the window based on this kernel
